Item.name: Anesthetic Tank
Item.description: An oxygen tank full of anesthetic, in order to keep patients asleep during surgery. Sometimes used for more nefarious purposes.

Item.name: Jovian Identifier Token
Item.description: A small red token used to identify Jovian Seperatists. Can be used to order some special items, if you have the proper PDA.

Item.name: Human Heart
Item.description: An actual human heart. God knows where this came from.

Item.name: Human Trachea
Item.description: An actual human throat. God knows where this came from.

Item.name: Fresh Human Trachea
Item.description: An actual human throat. Looks fresh. God knows where this came from.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: Husk Stinger Implantation
Item.description: An illegal program for the Autosurgeon that allows for implantation of a husk stinger.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: Husk Egg Implantation
Item.description: An illegal program for the Autosurgeon that allows for implantation of a husk egg sample.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: Husk Stinger Removal
Item.description: A program for the Autosurgeon that allows for removal of a husk stinger.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: Heart Removal
Item.description: An illegal program for the Autosurgeon that allows for removal of a heart. Quickly fatal.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: Corpse Revival
Item.description: A program for the Autosurgeon that allows for revival of the recently deceased..

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: Trachea Removal
Item.description: An illegal program for the Autosurgeon that allows for removal of the throat. Results in suffocation and muteness.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: Trachea Replacement
Item.description: An illegal program for the Autosurgeon that allows for replace of the throat.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: Heart Replacement
Item.description: A program for the Autosurgeon that allows for replacement of a heart.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: STEM Implantation
Item.description: A program for the Autosurgeon that allows for implantation of STEM.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program: Timed Explosive Implant
Item.description: An illegal program for the Autosurgeon that allows for implantation of a timed explosive.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Program Management PDA
Item.description: A PDA capable of programming FPGA Circuits with different Autosurgeon programs.

Button.text: Autosurgeon Program: Timed Explosive Implant [FPGA Circuit + Jovian ID Token]
Autosurgeon Program: Heart Removal [FPGA Circuit + Jovian ID Token]
Autosurgeon Program: Trachea Removal [FPGA Circuit + Jovian ID Token]
Autosurgeon Program: Husk Stinger Implantation [FPGA Circuit + Jovian ID Token]
Autosurgeon Program: Husk Egg Implantation [FPGA Circuit + Jovian ID Token]
Autosurgeon Program: Husk Stinger Removal [FPGA Circuit]

Item.name: Autosurgeon Mk. 1
Item.description: A complicated array of surgical instruments and electronics capable of performing surgical procedures in 10 seconds. It latches on to the patient when applied, leaving the bag empty. Can be used to extract husk parasites. One-time use due to poor construction.

Item.name: Autosurgeon Mk. 2
Item.description: A complicated array of surgical instruments and electronics capable of performing surgical procedures in 10 seconds. It latches on to the patient when applied, leaving the bag empty. Can be used to extract husk parasites. Four uses.

Item.name: Automated External Defibrilator
Item.description: A device which delivers a controlled shock in order to revive the recently deceased.
